title: 109_s3913
content: Keep Children Covered Act of 2006 - Amends title XXI (SCHIP) to: (1) establish a special rule for redistribution of unspent FY2004 allotments. (2) provide for additional allotments to eliminate FY2007 funding shortfalls remaining after redistribution of unspent FY2004 allotments. And (3) extend authority through FY2006 for qualifying states to use certain SCHIP funds for Medicaid expenditures.
